Its not only games but using a mobile phone gives you access to knowledge and social media apps that help your self esteem become more stronger
attributes.background: Mobile phones provide state of the arc knowledge facilities and fun encouraging was of learning.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Mobile phone policy in schools is the responsibility of individual schools. You could raise this with the school's governing body.

We also cannot accept petitions which are started with an incomplete name.
